function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Conversion to open-plan offices may lead to a higher risk of contagious disease spread due to increased interaction and reduced physical barriers.","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission within the office environment, potentially leading to outbreaks.","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene protocols, provide adequate ventilation, and encourage vaccination to mitigate the risk of disease transmission.","Technologies":"Use air purification systems, touchless fixtures, and smart building management systems to improve indoor air quality and reduce the spread of contagious diseases.","People":"Employees, visitors, and anyone present in the office environment.","Owner":"Facility managers, employers, and health and safety committees."}]}
